generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist and artistic design featuring a single, perfect cartoon hot dog resting peacefully on an ornate, smart-style golden platter. The platter is positioned on the left-center of the card against a clean, sky-blue background that matches the front cover. Delicate, stylized swirls of cartoon ketchup and mustard float gently around the platter, creating a sense of quiet satisfaction and artistic flair. The design is simple, elegant, and brings a humorous resolution to the hot dog theme. The bottom-right corner is left completely empty and undecorated.
generatedPrompts.frontCover: A humorous and whimsical illustration of two cartoon characters dressed in hot dog costumes. A male character and a female character, inspired by the reference, are depicted as charming, smiling hot dogs in buns. They are holding hands and jumping for joy mid-air, surrounded by a celebratory explosion of colorful confetti and stylized cartoon ketchup and mustard squiggles against a bright, cheerful sky-blue background. The scene is full of motion and happiness. In the center, the text 'Happy Birthday!' is written in a beautiful, clearly readable, flowing handwritten cursive script. The art style is flat 2D, with bold outlines and a vibrant, smart color palette of red, yellow, and blue. The overall composition is playful and energetic.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: An artistic and whimsical bird's-eye view of a meticulously arranged picnic blanket. The blanket features a smart, geometric pattern in the card's core colors of red, yellow, and blue. On the blanket, instead of typical picnic food, there is an assortment of gourmet condiments in beautiful, artistic bottles: a jar of artisan relish with a tiny silver spoon, a bottle of fancy ketchup, and a jar of sophisticated mustard. A single, perfect pickle spear is placed artfully on a small plate. The scene is playful and unexpected, setting a humorous and celebratory tone without any characters. The background is a soft, grassy green, suggesting a peaceful park setting.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A beautifully designed message space where the text is framed by an explosion of spectacular, stylized cartoon fireworks. The fireworks burst in vibrant shades of red, yellow, and blue, with shimmering gold accents, creating a dynamic and celebratory border. Intertwined with the firework trails are playful, looping squiggles of cartoon ketchup and mustard, tying the theme together. The handwritten message is centered perfectly within a clear space created by the fireworks: 'Wishing you a birthday that's even more spectacular than a firework finale! May your day be full of fun and celebration, and may all your hot dogs stay safely on your plate. Happy Birthday!'. The text is written in an elegant, legible, and warm handwritten cursive script with a natural pen-like flow.
